pr_title: Use better method description for StressMaster report

timeline.message: Use better method description for StressMaster report

timeline.bodyText: Could this return -1, and will that cause a problem?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: Yes it could return -1. No it wouldn't cause a problem because s.substring(0) returns s.
replies.author: bradyoo

replies.bodyText:
Conversely, returning the last index is also not a problem because
s.substring(s.length) returns an empty string.
replies.author: bradyoo
